Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: i dont see if satoshi dice takes a profit margin from every tx.

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: https://bitcoinplay.net/bitcoin-dice/

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: from this site i see many services have a 1% house edge

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it could also skew the odds in house favor to collect the 1%

Author: allbits#5898
Content: The point of no house edge is to draw attention to the uniqueness of what has been developed here. Of course, blockchain enforced, no house edge, has been deployed on ethereum, but it's been effectively useless for gas cost reasons.

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: True

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: But what is the incentive for the fund creator?

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: Afterall its someones money that is being used. There should be some incentive for that person or group

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: Just my guess though.

Author: allbits#5898
Content: Same incentive as the player, no? Because they're a degenerate gambler lol
